## Acceptance Criteria
<!-- Checklist of what "done" means -->

- [ ] Function signature matches specification
- [ ] Return value format is correct
- [ ] Error handling is implemented
- [ ] Code follows LRRS principles
- [ ] Docstring is complete
- [ ] Type hints are present
